thread.title: Chelsea Peretti shows off baby bump with Beyonce jokes on Instagram

author: USA TODAY
title: Chelsea Peretti shows off baby bump with Beyonce jokes on Instagram
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Chelsea Peretti shows off baby bump with Beyonce jokes on Instagram The "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" star has done her best to one-up Beyonce's pregnancy announcement. Post to Facebook Chelsea Peretti shows off baby bump with Beyonce jokes on Instagram The "Brooklyn Nine-Nine" star has done her best to one-up Beyonce's pregnancy announcement. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Chelsea Peretti shows off baby bump with Beyonce jokes on Instagram Cara Kelly , USA TODAY 10:00 a.m. ET Feb. 6, 2017 Jordan Peele and Chelsea Peretti arrive at night two of the Creative Arts Emmy Awards. (Photo: Richard Shotwell, Richard Shotwell/Invision/AP) 
Let the Beyoncé baby announcement parodies commence. 
Brooklyn Nine-Nine star Chelsea Peretti showed off her growing bump on Instagram over the weekend, captioning the photo, "beyonce schmonce." A photo posted by Chelsea Peretti (@chelsanity) on Feb 4, 2017 at 3:12pm PST 
The joke is a reference to Beyoncé's announcement last week on the photo-sharing platform that she is expecting twins, which broke the company's record for most-liked picture with nearly 10 million likes. 
This is the first child for Peretti, 38, and her comedian husband Jordan Peele, 37. The couple also announced their surprise wedding ceremony last year on Instagram. 
"Eloped a bit ago ... our only witness was this lil guy," she captioned the April 2016 post. A photo posted by Chelsea Peretti (@chelsanity) on Apr 26, 2016 at 10:59am PDT 
The Associated Press contributed to this report. CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE

We're sorry.
